tossup_question: -   –  After combing your hair, the comb becomes electrically charged. You then use the comb to pick up electrically neutral bits of paper, without making contact between the comb and the paper. What process allowed you to pick up the paper bits?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Conduction
X) Insulation
Y) Magnetization
Z) Polarization
bonus_question: -   –  What classic experiment used a squeeze-bulb atomizer to spray a mist of charged oil droplets between parallel plate electrodes?
bonus_answer: ANSWER: MILLIKAN OIL-DROP EXPERIMENT (ACCEPT: OIL DROP EXPERIMENT)
